00015 
00016 PlayState::PlayState() {
00017         this->background = IMG_Load(Setting::BACKGROUND_PLAY.c_str());
00018         if (!this->background) {
00019                 cerr << "Image could not load!";
00020         }
00021 
00022         // Set map size
00023         this->map = new Map(26, 23);
00024 
00025         imageAcid = IMG_Load(Map::getImage(2).c_str());
00026         imageIce = IMG_Load(Map::getImage(3).c_str());
00027         imageStone = IMG_Load(Map::getImage(4).c_str());
00028         imageSuperior = IMG_Load(Map::getImage(5).c_str());
00029 
00030         imageMightyOutcast = IMG_Load(Map::getImage(MIGHTY_OUTCAST).c_str());
00031         imageOutlaw = IMG_Load(Map::getImage(OUTLAW).c_str());
00032         imageRoyalKatanaMen = IMG_Load(Map::getImage(ROYAL_KATANA_MEN).c_str());
00033 
00034         // Set default properties on each rebel.
00035         Round mightyOutcast = Round();
00036         mightyOutcast.bonus = 10;
00037         mightyOutcast.count = 10;
00038         mightyOutcast.health = 0;
00039         mightyOutcast.frequent = 60;
00040         mightyOutcast.value = 10;
00041         mightyOutcast.speed = 1;
00042         mightyOutcast.type = MIGHTY_OUTCAST;
00043 
00044         Round outlaw = Round();
00045         outlaw.bonus = 10;
00046         outlaw.count = 10;
00047         outlaw.health = 0;
00048         outlaw.frequent = 45;
00049         outlaw.value = 15;
00050         outlaw.speed = 2;
00051         outlaw.type = OUTLAW;
00052 
00053         Round royalKatanaMen = Round();
00054         royalKatanaMen.bonus = 15;
00055         royalKatanaMen.count = 7;
00056         royalKatanaMen.health = 10;
00057         royalKatanaMen.frequent = 40;
00058         royalKatanaMen.value = 20;
00059         royalKatanaMen.speed = 2;
00060         royalKatanaMen.type = ROYAL_KATANA_MEN;
00061 
00062         // Set properties for rebels on each round.
00063         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Setting::ROUNDS; i++) {
00064                 // Every 5 round
00065                 if (i % 5 == 4) {
00066                         royalKatanaMen.count += 3;
00067                         royalKatanaMen.health += 150 + i * 10;
00068                         royalKatanaMen.speed += 0.1;
00069                         this->roundItem.push_back(royalKatanaMen);
00070                         // Every odd round
00071                 } else if (i % 2 == 0) {
00072                         mightyOutcast.count += 4;
00073                         mightyOutcast.health += 40 + i * 30;
00074                         mightyOutcast.speed += 0.1;
00075                         this->roundItem.push_back(mightyOutcast);
00076                         // Every even round
00077                 } else {
00078                         outlaw.count += 4;
00079                         outlaw.health += 50 + i * 30;
00080                         outlaw.speed += 0.1;
00081 
00082                         this->roundItem.push_back(outlaw);
00083                 }
00084         }
00085 
00086         // Default starting values
00087         this->holding = Setting::WEALTH;
00088         this->life = Setting::LIFE;
00089         this->round = 0;
00090         this->nextRebel = Setting::TIME_START;
00091 
00092         // Don't touch!
00093         this->buyTower = NULL;
00094         this->myScore = 0;
00095         this->pause = false;
00096 }
00097 
00101 PlayState::~PlayState() {
00102         if (NULL != this->background) {
00103                 SDL_FreeSurface(this->background);
00104                 this->background = NULL;
00105         }
00106 
00107         if (NULL != this->buyTower) {
00108                 delete this->buyTower;
00109                 this->buyTower = NULL;
00110         }
00111 
00112         delete map;
00113         map = NULL;
00114 
00115         for (vector<Shot*>::iterator itShot = this->shots.begin(); itShot
00116                         != this->shots.end();) {
00117                 delete *itShot;
00118                 itShot = this->shots.erase(itShot);
00119         }
00120 
00121         for (vector<Rebel*>::iterator itRebel = this->rebels.begin(); itRebel
00122                         != this->rebels.end();) {
00123                 delete *itRebel;
00124                 itRebel = this->rebels.erase(itRebel);
00125         }
00126 
00127         for (vector<Tower*>::iterator itTower = this->towers.begin(); itTower
00128                         != this->towers.end();) {
00129                 delete *itTower;
00130                 itTower = this->towers.erase(itTower);
00131         }
00132 
00133         SDL_FreeSurface(imageAcid);
00134         SDL_FreeSurface(imageIce);
00135         SDL_FreeSurface(imageStone);
00136         SDL_FreeSurface(imageSuperior);
00137 
00138         SDL_FreeSurface(imageMightyOutcast);
00139         SDL_FreeSurface(imageOutlaw);
00140         SDL_FreeSurface(imageRoyalKatanaMen);
00141 }
00142 
00146 void PlayState::clockTick() {
00147         if (this->pause) {
00148                 return;
00149         }
00150 
00151         // Move Rebel
00152         for (vector<Rebel*>::iterator itRebel = this->rebels.begin(); itRebel
00153                         != this->rebels.end();) {
00154                 // get available roads and move.
00155                 (*itRebel)->move(this->map->getEnvironment(this->map->pixelToPos(
00156                                 (*itRebel)->posX, (*itRebel)->posY)));
00157 
00158                 if (this->map->pixelToPos((*itRebel)->posX, (*itRebel)->posY)
00159                                 == this->map->endPoint) {
00160 
00161                         delete *itRebel;
00162                         itRebel = this->rebels.erase(itRebel);
00163                         this->life--;
00164                 } else {
00165                         // check if shots are near.
00166                         for (vector<Shot*>::iterator itShot = this->shots.begin(); itShot
00167                                         != this->shots.end();) {
00168                                 int add = 1;
00169                                 if (PlayState::intersect((*itShot)->posX, (*itShot)->posY,
00170                                                 (*itRebel)->posX, (*itRebel)->posY, 10, 20)) {
00171 
00172                                         // Reduce rebel hp
00173                                         if ((*itShot)->speciality == SUPERIOR) {
00174                                                 (*itRebel)->health -= (*itShot)->damage;
00175                                         }
00176 
00177                                         // Poison
00178                                         if ((*itShot)->speciality == ACID) {
00179                                                 (*itRebel)->speed -= 0.05;
00180                                                 (*itRebel)->health -= (*itShot)->damage * 0.4;
00181                                                 (*itRebel)->poison = (*itShot)->damage * 0.6;
00182                                         }
00183 
00184                                         // Reduce rebel speed and some areaofeffect
00185                                         if ((*itShot)->speciality == ICE) {
00186                                                 (*itRebel)->speed -= 0.5;
00187                                                 (*itShot)->hasHit = true;
00188                                                 // For areaofeffect;
00189                                         } else if ((*itShot)->speciality == STONE) {
00190                                                 (*itShot)->hasHit = true;
00191                                         } else {
00192 
00193                                                 // delete shot
00194                                                 delete *itShot;
00195                                                 itShot = this->shots.erase(itShot);
00196                                                 add = 0;
00197                                         }
00198                                 }
00199                                 if (add) {
00200                                         itShot++;
00201                                 }
00202                         }
00203 
00204                         // check hp if dead.
00205                         if ((*itRebel)->health <= 0) {
00206                                 this->holding += (*itRebel)->value;
00207 
00208                                 delete *itRebel;
00209                                 itRebel = this->rebels.erase(itRebel);
00210                         } else {
00211                                 itRebel++;
00212                         }
00213                 }
00214         }
00215 
00216         // Tower is tracking rebels
00217         for (vector<Tower*>::iterator itTower = this->towers.begin(); itTower
00218                         != this->towers.end(); itTower++) {
00219                 (*itTower)->clockTick();
00220 
00221                 for (vector<Rebel*>::iterator itRebel = this->rebels.begin(); itRebel
00222                                 != this->rebels.end(); itRebel++) {
00223 
00224                         // if rebel found , shoot
00225                         if ((*itTower)->fire((*itRebel)->posX, (*itRebel)->posY)) {
00226                                 double angle = atan2(static_cast<double> ((*itRebel)->posY
00227                                                 - (*itTower)->posY),
00228                                                 static_cast<double> ((*itRebel)->posX
00229                                                                 - (*itTower)->posX));
00230 
00231                                 this->shots.push_back(new Shot((*itTower), angle));
00232                         }
00233                 }
00234         }
00235 
00236         for (vector<Shot*>::iterator itShot = this->shots.begin(); itShot
00237                         != this->shots.end();) {
00238                 if (!(*itShot)->hasHit) {
00239                         (*itShot)->move();
00240                         if ((*itShot)->fuel <= 0) {
00241                                 // delete shot
00242                                 delete *itShot;
00243                                 itShot = this->shots.erase(itShot);
00244                         } else {
00245                                 itShot++;
00246                         }
00247                 } else {
00248 
00249                         for (vector<Rebel*>::iterator itRebel = this->rebels.begin(); itRebel
00250                                         != this->rebels.end();) {
00251                                 if (PlayState::intersect((*itShot)->posX, (*itShot)->posY,
00252                                                 (*itRebel)->posX, (*itRebel)->posY,
00253                                                 (*itShot)->areaOfEffect, 20)) {
00254 
00255                                         (*itRebel)->health -= (*itShot)->damage;
00256 
00257                                         if ((*itRebel)->health <= 0) {
00258                                                 this->holding += (*itRebel)->value;
00259 
00260                                                 delete *itRebel;
00261                                                 itRebel = this->rebels.erase(itRebel);
00262                                         } else {
00263                                                 itRebel++;
00264                                         }
00265                                 } else {
00266                                         itRebel++;
00267                                 }
00268                         }
00269                         // delete shot
00270                         delete *itShot;
00271                         itShot = this->shots.erase(itShot);
00272 
00273                 }
00274         }
00275 
00276         // On game over
00277         if (this->life == 0 || (this->round >= Setting::ROUNDS
00278                         && this->rebels.size() == 0)) {
00279 
00280                 AbstractGameState* state = new GameOverState();
00281                 this->state = state;
00282                 this->state->myScore = (this->round + 1) * this->holding;
00283                 this->state->round = this->round;
00284                 this->state->mapLoaded = this->map->mapLoaded;
00285         }
00286 
00287         if (this->round < Setting::ROUNDS) {
00288                 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < this->round; i++) {
00289                         if (this->roundItem[i].count > 0 && rand() % this->map->squareSize
00290                                         == 0) {
00291                                 int x = this->map->posToPixelX(this->map->startPoint);
00292                                 int y = this->map->posToPixelY(this->map->startPoint);
00293 
00294                                 this->rebels.push_back(new Rebel(this->roundItem[i], x, y));
00295                                 this->roundItem[i].count--;
00296                                 break;
00297                         }
00298                 }
00299 
00300                 // Initiate rebels on each round.
00301                 if (this->roundItem[this->round].count > 0 && this->nextRebel <= 0) {
00302                         int x = this->map->posToPixelX(this->map->startPoint);
00303                         int y = this->map->posToPixelY(this->map->startPoint);
00304 
00305                         this->rebels.push_back(
00306                                         new Rebel(this->roundItem[this->round], x, y));
00307                         this->roundItem[this->round].count--;
00308                         this->nextRebel = this->roundItem[this->round].frequent / (rand()
00309                                         % 2 + 1);
00310                 }
00311                 this->nextRebel--;
00312 
00313                 // Set new round when all rebels spawned in the current round.
00314                 if (roundItem[this->round].count == 0) {
00315                         this->holding += roundItem[this->round].bonus;
00316                         this->round++;
00317                         this->nextRebel = 90;
00318                 }
00319         }
00320 }

00325 void PlayState::draw(SDL_Surface* surface) {
00326         if (this->pause) {
00327                 if (!this->reDraw) {
00328                         return;
00329                 } else {
00330                         this->reDraw = false;
00331                 }
00332         }
00333 
00334         // Text color white
00335         SDL_Color whiteColor = { 255, 255, 255, 0 };
00336         // Text color black
00337         SDL_Color blackColor = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
00338 
00339         SDL_Rect rect;
00340         rect.x = 0;
00341         rect.y = 0;
00342         SDL_BlitSurface(this->background, NULL, surface, &rect);
00343 
00344         // Draw map
00345         this->map->draw(surface);
00346 
00347         // Draw rebels
00348         for (vector<Rebel*>::iterator itRebel = this->rebels.begin(); itRebel
00349                         != this->rebels.end(); itRebel++) {
00350                 //(*itRebel)->draw(surface);
00351 
00352                 if ((*itRebel)->type == MIGHTY_OUTCAST) {
00353                         (*itRebel)->draw(surface, this->imageMightyOutcast);
00354                 } else if ((*itRebel)->type == OUTLAW) {
00355                         (*itRebel)->draw(surface, this->imageOutlaw);
00356                 } else if ((*itRebel)->type == ROYAL_KATANA_MEN) {
00357                         (*itRebel)->draw(surface, this->imageRoyalKatanaMen);
00358                 }
00359         }
00360 
00361         // Draw towers
00362         for (vector<Tower*>::iterator itTower = this->towers.begin(); itTower
00363                         != this->towers.end(); itTower++) {
00364                 if (this->map->mousePosition == this->map->pixelToPos((*itTower)->posX,
00365                                 (*itTower)->posY)) {
00366                         if ((*itTower)->type == ACID) {
00367                                 (*itTower)->draw(surface, this->imageAcid, true);
00368                         } else if ((*itTower)->type == ICE) {
00369                                 (*itTower)->draw(surface, this->imageIce, true);
00370                         } else if ((*itTower)->type == SUPERIOR) {
00371                                 (*itTower)->draw(surface, this->imageSuperior, true);
00372                         } else if ((*itTower)->type == STONE) {
00373                                 (*itTower)->draw(surface, this->imageStone, true);
00374                         }
00375                 } else {
00376                         if ((*itTower)->type == ACID) {
00377                                 (*itTower)->draw(surface, this->imageAcid);
00378                         } else if ((*itTower)->type == ICE) {
00379                                 (*itTower)->draw(surface, this->imageIce);
00380                         } else if ((*itTower)->type == SUPERIOR) {
00381                                 (*itTower)->draw(surface, this->imageSuperior);
00382                         } else if ((*itTower)->type == STONE) {
00383                                 (*itTower)->draw(surface, this->imageStone);
00384                         }
00385                 }
00386 
00387         }
00388 
00389         // Draw shots
00390         for (vector<Shot*>::iterator itShot = this->shots.begin(); itShot
00391                         != this->shots.end(); itShot++) {
00392                 (*itShot)->draw(surface);
00393         }
00394 
00395         // If user have selected a tower.
00396         if (this->buyTower != NULL) {
00397                 if (this->buyTower->type == ACID) {
00398                         this->buyTower->draw(surface, this->imageAcid, true);
00399                 } else if (this->buyTower->type == ICE) {
00400                         this->buyTower->draw(surface, this->imageIce, true);
00401                 } else if (this->buyTower->type == SUPERIOR) {
00402                         this->buyTower->draw(surface, this->imageSuperior, true);
00403                 } else if (this->buyTower->type == STONE) {
00404                         this->buyTower->draw(surface, this->imageStone, true);
00405                 }
00406         }
00407 
00408         // Pause text
00409         if (this->pause) {
00410                 boxRGBA(surface, 200, 120, 540, 330, 150, 200, 150, 255);
00411                 Draw::text(surface, "Pause", blackColor, 250, 110, 110);
00412 
00413                 Draw::text(surface, "Go to start", whiteColor, 250, 220, 32);
00414                 Draw::text(surface, "Continue", whiteColor, 250, 250, 32);
00415                 Draw::text(surface, "Exit", whiteColor, 250, 280, 32);
00416                 return;
00417         }
00418 
00419         // Print out information
00420         // At upper right
00421         Draw::text(surface, "Information", whiteColor, 825, 23, 32, 100);
00422         Draw::text(surface, "Round: " + AbstractGameState::intToString(this->round
00423                         + 1), whiteColor, 825, 60, 20);
00424         Draw::text(surface, "Life: " + AbstractGameState::intToString(this->life),
00425                         whiteColor, 825, 90, 20);
00426         Draw::text(surface, "Wealth: " + AbstractGameState::intToString(
00427                         this->holding) + " stone", whiteColor, 825, 120, 20);
00428         Draw::text(surface, "Next wave", blackColor, 825, 200, 30);
00429 
00430         // At middle right
00431         Draw::text(surface, "Market", blackColor, 830, 290, 50, 100);
00432         int marketTowerX = 800;
00433         rect.x = marketTowerX;
00434         rect.y = 350;
00435         SDL_BlitSurface(imageAcid, NULL, surface, &rect);
00436         rect.x = marketTowerX + 50;
00437         SDL_BlitSurface(imageIce, NULL, surface, &rect);
00438         rect.x = marketTowerX + 100;
00439         SDL_BlitSurface(imageSuperior, NULL, surface, &rect);
00440         rect.x = marketTowerX + 150;
00441         SDL_BlitSurface(imageStone, NULL, surface, &rect);
00442 
00443         // When mouse hover over tower. Display information about it.
00444         if (this->marketChoice == ACID) {
00445                 Draw::text(surface, "Information", blackColor, 800, 390, 30);
00446                 Draw::text(surface, "Name: Acid Tower", blackColor, 800, 430, 22);
00447                 Draw::text(surface, "Price: 80 stone", blackColor, 800, 460, 22);
00448                 Draw::text(surface, "Specialty:", blackColor, 800, 490, 22);
00449                 Draw::text(surface, "The tower will break down", blackColor, 810, 510,
00450                                 16);
00451                 Draw::text(surface, "the rebels to a painful death.", blackColor, 810,
00452                                 530, 16);
00453         } else if (this->marketChoice == ICE) {
00454                 Draw::text(surface, "Information", blackColor, 800, 390, 30);
00455                 Draw::text(surface, "Name: Ice Tower", blackColor, 800, 430, 22);
00456                 Draw::text(surface, "Price: 120 stone", blackColor, 800, 460, 22);
00457                 Draw::text(surface, "Specialty:", blackColor, 800, 490, 22);
00458                 Draw::text(surface, "Preventing the rebels rapid", blackColor, 810,
00459                                 510, 16);
00460                 Draw::text(surface, "storm attack.", blackColor, 810, 530, 16);
00461         } else if (this->marketChoice == SUPERIOR) {
00462                 Draw::text(surface, "Information", blackColor, 800, 390, 30);
00463                 Draw::text(surface, "Name: Superior Tower", blackColor, 800, 430, 22);
00464                 Draw::text(surface, "Price: 200 stone", blackColor, 800, 460, 22);
00465                 Draw::text(surface, "Specialty:", blackColor, 800, 490, 22);
00466                 Draw::text(surface, "It has none, but it focus", blackColor, 810, 510,
00467                                 16);
00468                 Draw::text(surface, "on the firepower.", blackColor, 810, 530, 16);
00469         } else if (this->marketChoice == STONE) {
00470                 Draw::text(surface, "Information", blackColor, 800, 390, 30);
00471                 Draw::text(surface, "Name: Stone Tower", blackColor, 800, 430, 22);
00472                 Draw::text(surface, "Price: 300 stone", blackColor, 800, 460, 22);
00473                 Draw::text(surface, "Specialty:", blackColor, 800, 490, 22);
00474                 Draw::text(surface, "It's fire power can hit", blackColor, 810, 510, 16);
00475                 Draw::text(surface, "several rebels in one shot.", blackColor, 810,
00476                                 530, 16);
00477         }
00478 }
00479 
00480 void PlayState::keyPressed(SDLKey key) {
00481         // Pause and unpause
00482         if (SDLK_p == key || SDLK_ESCAPE == key) {
00483                 if (!this->pause) {
00484                         delete this->buyTower;
00485                         this->buyTower = NULL;
00486                         this->pause = true;
00487                 } else {
00488                         this->reDraw = true;
00489                         this->pause = false;
00490                 }
00491         }
00492 }
00493 
00494 void PlayState::mouseMoved(const int button, const int mouseX, const int mouseY) {
00495         // When mouse hover over tower. Display information about it.
00496         if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 800, 350, 30, 30)) {
00497                 this->marketChoice = ACID;
00498         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 850, 350, 30, 30)) {
00499                 this->marketChoice = ICE;
00500         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 900, 350, 30, 30)) {
00501                 this->marketChoice = SUPERIOR;
00502         } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 950, 350, 30, 30)) {
00503                 this->marketChoice = STONE;
00504         } else {
00505                 this->marketChoice = EMPTY_TOWER;
00506         }
00507 
00508         int mapPosition = this->map->pixelToPos(mouseX, mouseY);
00509         // If user have selected a tower.
00510         if (this->buyTower != NULL) {
00511                 if (this->map->mouseOver(mouseX, mouseY)) {
00512                         int x = this->map->posToPixelX(mapPosition);
00513                         int y = this->map->posToPixelY(mapPosition);
00514                         this->buyTower->setPos(x, y);
00515                 } else {
00516                         this->buyTower->setPos(mouseX, mouseY);
00517                 }
00518         }
00519         if (this->map->mouseOver(mouseX, mouseY)) {
00520                 this->map->mousePosition = mapPosition;
00521         } else {
00522                 this->map->mousePosition = -1;
00523         }
00524 }
00525 
00526 void PlayState::mousePressed(const int button, const int mouseX,
00527                 const int mouseY) {
00528 
00529         if (this->pause) {
00530                 if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 250, 225, 150, 30)) {
00531                         // Go to start
00532                         AbstractGameState* state = new IntroState();
00533                         this->state = state;
00534                 } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 250, 255, 150, 30)) {
00535                         // Continue
00536                         this->reDraw = true;
00537                         this->pause = false;
00538                 } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 250, 285, 150, 30)) {
00539                         // exit
00540                         this->done = true;
00541                 }
00542         }
00543 
00544         // next round
00545         if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 825, 200, 140, 30)) {
00546                 if (this->round < Setting::ROUNDS - 1) {
00547                         this->round++;
00548                         this->holding += 30;
00549                 }
00550         }
00551 
00552         // Buy menu
00553         if (this->buyTower != NULL) {
00554                 // check if mouse it over game map
00555                 if (this->map->mouseOver(mouseX, mouseY)) {
00556                         // check if tile is empty
00557                         if (this->map->getData(this->map->pixelToPos(mouseX, mouseY)) == 0) {
00558 
00559                                 // check if tower is already on tile
00560                                 bool towerExist = false;
00561                                 for (vector<Tower*>::iterator itTower = this->towers.begin(); itTower
00562                                                 != this->towers.end(); itTower++) {
00563                                         if (this->map->pixelToPos((*itTower)->posX,
00564                                                         (*itTower)->posY) == this->map->pixelToPos(mouseX,
00565                                                         mouseY)) {
00566                                                 towerExist = true;
00567                                                 break;
00568                                         }
00569                                 }
00570                                 if (!towerExist) {
00571                                         this->holding -= this->buyTower->price;
00572                                         this->towers.push_back(this->buyTower);
00573                                         this->buyTower = NULL;
00574                                 }
00575                         }
00576                 } else {
00577                         delete this->buyTower;
00578                         this->buyTower = NULL;
00579                 }
00580         } else {
00581                 if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 800, 350, 30, 30)) {
00582                         if (this->holding - ACID >= 0) {
00583                                 this->buyTower = new Tower(ACID);
00584                                 this->buyTower->setPos(mouseX, mouseY);
00585                         }
00586                 } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 850, 350, 30, 30)) {
00587                         if (this->holding - ICE >= 0) {
00588                                 this->buyTower = new Tower(ICE);
00589                                 this->buyTower->setPos(mouseX, mouseY);
00590                         }
00591                 } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 900, 350, 30, 30)) {
00592                         if (this->holding - SUPERIOR >= 0) {
00593                                 this->buyTower = new Tower(SUPERIOR);
00594                                 this->buyTower->setPos(mouseX, mouseY);
00595                         }
00596                 } else if (mouseHit(mouseX, mouseY, 950, 350, 30, 30)) {
00597                         if (this->holding - STONE >= 0) {
00598                                 this->buyTower = new Tower(STONE);
00599                                 this->buyTower->setPos(mouseX, mouseY);
00600                         }
00601                 }
00602         }
00603 }
00604 
00605 const bool PlayState::intersect(const double x1, const double y1, const int x2,
00606                 const int y2, const int aoe1, const int aoe2) {
00607         if (y1 + aoe1 < y2)
00608                 return false;
00609         if (y1 > y2 + aoe2)
00610                 return false;
00611 
00612         if (x1 + aoe1 < x2)
00613                 return false;
00614         if (x1 > x2 + aoe2)
00615                 return false;
00616 
00617         return true;
00618 
00619 }
